resources.string: Keep up to date with the latest news and cool initiatives from our innovation district...

string.name: onboarding_events_text
string.comment: Onboarding wizard: text to show in second step

resources.string: Summer at NOI, Maker workshops, Coffee Hour - never miss out on one of our vibrant community events…

string.name: onboarding_meetup_text
string.comment: Onboarding wizard: text to show in third step

resources.string: 900 people, united in one place. Connect with others, whether it\'s for an R&D project or just a casual exchange of ideas...

resources.string: Hi %1$s (%2$s), you are not authorised to use this app. Please contact your HR office for more information.

string.name: access_not_granted_msg
string.comment: Access not granted body

resources.string: Hi, you have a valid Open Data Hub- or NOI-Account and you are logged in, but you miss the permissions to access the Community App. Please write to community@noi.bz.it to learn more.

string.name: login_browser_error_msg
string.comment: Message to show when login fails due to browser compatibility issues

resources.string: You must have installed a compatible browser (Chrome, Firefox or Samsung Browser) to continue with authentication. If you have already installed it, restart the app and try again.

string.name: user_info_error_msg
string.comment: Message to show when an error occurs loding user info (i.e. connection error, json parsing error...)

string.name: logout_error_msg
string.comment: Message to show when an error occurs during logout

string.name: maps_error_msg
string.comment: Message to show if you try to search a company address, but you haven\'t installed the relative app

resources.string: Download Google Maps or Waze to find the address on the map.

Dear NOI-Community Team,

I would like to request the cancellation of my profile from the NOI-Community database. The reason is that
(please select)

- I am no longer employed by an institute/company at NOI Techpark;
- I am not interested in being in contact with the NOI-Community and in receiving news in this regard;
- others.

Thank you!
